segments.text: Do you have any shoes like these ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m sorry . We don't haven any .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But my sister bought this pair last month .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , she bought them in the U . S .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We had some shoes like those a month ago , but we don't have any now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you get a pair for me please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m afraid that I can ’ t . They were in fashion last year and the year before last . But they ’ re not in fashion this year . These shoes are in fashion now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They are very uncomfortable . But women always wear uncomfortable shoes !
segments.speaker: S2
